name: Roswell Conspiracies: Aliens, Myths & Legends
description: Extraterrestrial beings, disguised as vampires, werewolves and other mythic creatures are roaming the Earth. You have been recruited as a secret detection agent by an underground group called 'The Global Alliance' operating from a bunker in the small town of Roswell, New Mexico. Your mission is to track these alien creatures across the globe from London to New Orleans to protect the Earth and its inhabitants... the only myth is that you're safe.
